miracles.title: The Eucharistic Miracle of Lanciano
miracles.description: During Mass, the consecrated bread and wine transformed into actual flesh and blood, which remain incorrupt to this day.

miracles.title: Our Lady of Guadalupe
miracles.description: The Virgin Mary appeared to Juan Diego, leaving her miraculous image on his tilma, which remains perfectly preserved.

miracles.title: The Miracle of the Sun
miracles.description: 70,000 witnesses saw the sun dance and spin in the sky during the final apparition of Our Lady of Fatima.

miracles.title: Saint Bernadette's Incorrupt Body
miracles.description: The body of Saint Bernadette remains perfectly preserved 140+ years after her death, showing no signs of decay.

miracles.title: The Healing Waters of Lourdes
miracles.description: Countless miraculous healings have occurred at the spring revealed by Our Lady to Saint Bernadette.
